Detailed Source ReferenceÂ¶

The pyioflash package provides the following classes as a user interface, SimulationData and SimulationPlot. These classes provide the methods and functionality necessary to read, manipulate, and plot the simulation data contained in FLASH4 hdf5 output files.

The following pages document the package modules, classes, and methods in detail.

  • pyio module
  • pyio_plot module
  • pyio_collections module
  • pyio_types module
  • pyio_utility module
  • pyio_options module
